State: The Navajo Nation uses Daylight Saving Time (DST), the rest of the state does not
American Samoa does not use Daylight Saving Time (DST)

Time Zone: Most of the state: Eastern Standard Time (EST)

State: West of the Apalachicola River: Central Standard Time (CST)
Guam does not use Daylight Saving Time (DST)
Hawaii does not use Daylight Saving Time (DST)

Time Zone: Most of the state: Mountain Standard Time (MST)

State: North of the Salmon River: Pacific Standard Time (PST)

Time Zone: Most of the state: Eastern Standard Time (EST)

State: Some counties near the southwestern and northwestern border of the state use Central Standard Time (CST)

Time Zone: Most of the state: Central Standard Time (CST)

State: Greeley, Hamilton, Sherman and Wallace counties: Mountain Standard Time (MST)

Time Zone: Western half of the state: Central Standard Time (CST)

State: Eastern half of the state: Eastern Standard Time (EST)

Time Zone: Most of the state: Eastern Standard Time (EST)

State: Dickinson, Gogebic, Iron and Menominee Counties: Central Standard Time (CST)

Time Zone: Most of the state: Central Standard Time (CST)

State: Western part of the state: Mountain Standard Time (MST)

Time Zone: Most of the state: Pacific Standard Time (PST)

State: 2 small towns, Jackpot and West Wendover: Mountain Standard Time (MST)

Time Zone: Most of the state: Central Standard Time (CST)

State: Western North Dakota: Mountain Standard Time (MST)
The CNMI does not use Daylight Saving Time (DST)

Time Zone: Most of the state: Pacific Standard Time (PST)

State: Part of Malheur County: Mountain Standard Time (MST)
Puerto Rico does not use Daylight Saving Time (DST)

Time Zone: Eastern South Dakota: Central Standard Time (CST)

State: Western South Dakota: Mountain Standard Time (MST)
Middle Tennessee, plus Marion County: Central Standard Time (CST)
East Tennessee, except Marion County: Eastern Standard Time (EST)

Time Zone: Most of the state: Central Standard Time (CST)

State: El Paso and Hudspeth Counties: Mountain Standard Time (MST)
The USVI does not use Daylight Saving Time (DST)
